Inquirer

You are in the business of uncovering secrets. You likely worked as a detective, private investigator, or spy. You’ve learned to spot things that are out of place, as well as how to read others and hold your own secrets close to your chest.

Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom score increases by 1. Your Intelligence, Charisma, or Dexterity score increases by 1.

Doubt. Whenever you determine that a creature is lying to you or withholding the truth, either through a successful Wisdom (Insight) check or other means, you have advantage on your first Charisma (Intimidation) check directed at that creature made within the next 24 hours. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.SR6MZ5RBJ3PWO86U]{Doubt}

Skills. Choose two from: Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Persuasion, Stealth.

Tools. You gain proficiency with one of the following: Disguise Kit, Forgery Kit, Thieves’ Tools, a gaming set, Tinker’s Tools.

Languages. One of your choice.
